name: Jetpack Gentlemen - Harlem Shake Hunting
description:
Oh SNAP! Gangnam with a Jetpack vs Harlem in aeroplanes!

Does it get any crazier than that!? We didn't think so!

Jump in and jetpack your way to Gangnam glory as you blast your way past the Harlem planes. Get your revenge on Harlem lovers.

With classic jetpack action fly, shoot and collect as you battle in the ultimate dance scene.

Massive bass beats keep the action flowing in this crazy game that is fun for all the family.
